title: [Ceiluir Glade, Quiet Trail]
description: Sloping gently downward towards the beach below, the pathway is a transition of squared cobblestones mixed with glittering sands and tall sea grasses.  Wild dog roses release their heady fragrance into the air, while plump bumblebees buzz and sip at their petals.

Sloping gently downward towards the beach below, the pathway is a transition of squared cobblestones mixed with glittering sands and tall sea grasses.  Bamboo-poled torches flicker in the persistent sea breeze that also sets the wild dog roses to rustling from their home off in the nearby dunes.
